front.title: Use of KCipher-2 with Poly1305 in Transport Layer Security

abstract.t: This document describes the use of the KCipher-2 stream cipher with Poly1305 in Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocols version 1.2 and Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) protocols. KCipher-2 is a stream cipher with a 128-bit key and a 128-bit initialization vector, which provides fast, efficient encryption and decryption.
